tool_description: Recommends and configures typography systems for mobile apps, including font families, sizes, weights, and hierarchy.

app_personality.description: App personality: modern, classic, playful, professional, minimal, or bold

readability_priority.description: Readability priority level: high, medium, or standard

platform_guidelines.description: Platform design guidelines to follow: material, human-interface, or custom

font_loading.description: Font loading preference: system-fonts, web-fonts, or hybrid

error_messages: Invalid app personality: Use modern, classic, playful, professional, minimal, or bold
Invalid readability priority: Use high, medium, or standard
Invalid platform guidelines: Use material, human-interface, or custom
Invalid font loading: Use system-fonts, web-fonts, or hybrid
usage: Specify app_personality and readability_priority; optionally set platform_guidelines and font_loading to receive typography recommendations with font families and size scales.

font_sizes.description: Recommended font sizes for different text levels

font_weights.description: Font weights to use (light, regular, medium, bold)

line_heights.description: Line height ratios for different text sizes
